text: Did you use the CLI with `--mode=publish` or setup your YAML? See: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cli#modes>

Hi, I would like to know if someone can help me with the implementation of a horizontal menu in the header. HubSpot migrated my site from Wordpress that only had hamburger menu so I can not select the traditional menu as it can be implemented, is it very difficult? Thank you very much for your help.

If you’re a developer you can see an <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/tree/main/src/modules/menu-section.module|example of a custom coded menu in our boilerplate>.

We also have a doc on creating navigation menus:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/menus-and-navigation>


If you’re not a developer I would recommend posting in <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> to find one, or look in our solutions partner directory.
